overview: Smooth-talking stud Michael convinces the hotel clerk to extend his stay so he can continue his sex marathon with boyfriend Shawn. But when the clerk accidently double books the room, hot couple Troy and JD find they can't check in to the sold-out hotel. Michael invites the gorgeous young men to stay the night, but Sean suspects there's more to his boyfriend's offer than meets the eye. As the four young men get to know each other in intimate quarters, new attractions emerge -- and dangerous temptations arise. Starring Michael Delray, Troy Accola, Shawn Andrews, JD Phoenix.
title: Cheaters 3
